title: How to Use Clan Chat in RuneScape

steps.title: Click on Clan Setup.
steps.content: Click on Clan Setup. This takes you to the place where you can name your clan, set who can watch your clan chat, set who can talk on your clan chat, set who is able to kick people from your clan chat, and give ranks to the people in your clan.

steps.title: Make you clan's name.
steps.content: Make you clan's name. Choosing a clan name is needed if you want to use this feature. However, it must be 12 letters/numbers or less. Remember, you can always change your clan's name if you want to.

steps.title: Choose who can enter the clan chat.
steps.content: Choose who can enter the clan chat. Entering the chat means to watch the chat. You can choose who has the ability to enter the chat. This is helpful because it can stop rival clans from seeing the clan talking.

steps.title: Choose who can talk in the chat.
steps.content: Choose who can talk in the chat. Now you get to control who can talk in the chat. So this can help if you only want people observing your clan chat if you don't want them talking in it.

steps.title: Choose who can kick people from the chat.
steps.content: Choose who can kick people from the chat. Kicking people from chat is basically throwing them out of chat so that person can't talk. It's normally a good idea not to let untrusted people kick because they could kick people you're trying to have a discussion with or yourself! This is good for annoying people coming in chatting.

steps.title: Choose the ranks of the people in your clan.
steps.content: Choose the ranks of the people in your clan. The person who hosts the chat is automatically the Channel Owner. The other ranks which can be given out are from highest to lowest rank: General, Captain, Lieutenant, Sergeant, Corporal , Recruit, and Friend. You can only give ranks to people on your friends list. If they are not in your clan and are on your friends list, the are automatically a Friend.

steps.title: Click on the X when you are done.
steps.content: Click on the X when you are done. You do not need to press any save buttons. So when you feel satisfied with your new clan, click the X button.

steps.title: Click on Join Chat.
steps.content: Click on Join Chat. This will let you pick which clan chat you would like to join.

steps.title: Type the clan owner's username.
steps.content: Type the clan owner's username. Yes, you type their username, not the name of the clan. If you're trying to talk to your own clan, type your own username in.

steps.title: Start chatting with your clan.
steps.content: Start chatting with your clan. To do this, just put a / before the message. Once you have done this you should have successfully typed a message to your clan!

steps.title: End the chat when you are done.
steps.content: End the chat when you are done. All you have to do is press the button that will get you out of that clan's chat. This is good because you can only talk with one clan at a time.
